titles: An essay for the discovery and discouraging of the new sprung schism raised and maintained by Mr Simon Henden of Bennenden in Kent. Exhibited in some passages of writing which have gone between Mr John Elmeston of Cranebroke, and the same M. Henden. Published according to order.
author: Elmeston, John.
Henden, Simon, attributed name.
publisher: printed for C. Meredith at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Attributed by Wing to Simon Henden.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Continuity of the church --  Anglican Communion --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Church history --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
